participant_1.background:
I used to go to subway with my dad.
I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.
i am a waitress at a popular houston club.
my mother passed away in 1979.
i went to college in maryland.

participant_2.background:
I don't have time for Comic Con, but I do have time to volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.
in my spare time i like to play video games.
i earn passive income that no one knows about.
I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games.

content.text: Hey there, I am doing well!
That is great to hear! Are you doing anything fun this weekend?
I am going to volunteer at my local animal shelter. I love animals.
Oh that is so nice of you! I am sure the animals appreciate it.
Thanks! I used to play sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.
Oh no! That is too bad. I hope it gets better soon!
Thanks! It is getting better. I have been eating healthier and doing yoga.
That is great! I am glad to hear it.
Thanks! How about you? What are you doing this weekend?
I am going to the movies with my friends. We are going to see the new Star Wars movie.
Oh that sounds fun! I love Star Wars!
Me too! I am excited to see it.
Me too! I hope you have a great time!
